unnormalised: ## Payment Gateways: Your Digital Darzi for Seamless Transactions!
normalised: Payment Gateways: Your Digital Darzi for Seamless Transactions!

unnormalised: So, you've finally decided to open that online shop selling hand-painted Madhubani sarees, eh? Good on you, Anita! But hold your horses (or, ahem, elephants) – before you start picturing yourself sipping chai on a Goa beach with all that moolah, you need a *payment gateway*. Think of it as your digital darzi, stitching together the customer's desire to buy your gorgeous saree with your bank account's desperate need for funds.

unnormalised: Choosing the right gateway is like picking the perfect spice blend for your grandmother's secret recipe. It needs to be secure (nobody wants their data pilfered!), reliable (no more error messages, please!), and easy to use (even Uncle Sharma should be able to figure it out). Think Razorpay, PayU, BillDesk – the usual suspects. Do your research, compare transaction fees (those sneaky charges can eat into your profits!), and make sure it plays nice with your e-commerce platform (Shopify, WooCommerce, etc.).
